meanings.sent1: She had so many toys, but she loved her doll collection the muches.

meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree
meanings.sent1: He muches enjoys playing soccer with his friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She muches prefers reading books over watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The cat muches naps in the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The flowers muches bloomed after the rain shower.
meanings.sent5: The students muches studied for their exams all night long.
